credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Battle scene
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper
description: One of a three part drawing.  Drawing of a battle with soldiers on horse and foot.  Drawing to the right is 1901-39-2799.  Drawing of a man with a sword, on a horse driven chariot at left and a group of soldiers at right attacking the chariot with long spears.  At bottom right a fallen horse.
name: Drawing
